name: sprestage/unofficial-trakehner-db
description: This is the third iteration of the Unofficial Trakehner Database.  This was a hobby project that I used as one of my final projects for Code Fellows in 2013.  As a breeder of Trakehner horses in 2013, I found a dearth of genealogical data available in an easily searchable form.  This project was my remedy to that issue.
